title: The Metaverse - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/5/22
itunes:title: The Metaverse - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/5/22
description:
George Noory and economist John Truman Wolfe discuss his research into the metaverse, and how companies like Facebook and Nike are creating items like virtual real estate and even virtual sneakers for new activities online that are becoming more commonplace in our everyday lives.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
